name: Lemonade Model
natural_language_description: 这是 Lemonade Model 节点。主要用于: Language Model Lemonade

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one

model.name: model
model.description: The model which will generate the completion. Models are loaded and managed through the Lemonade server.
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model which will generate the completion. Models are loaded and managed through the Lemonade server. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: temperature (值: None) - Controls the randomness of the generated text. Lower values make the output more focused and deterministic, while higher values make it more diverse and random.
topP (值: None) - Chooses from the smallest possible set of tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds the probability top_p. Helps generate more human-like text by reducing repetitions.
frequencyPenalty (值: None) - Adjusts the penalty for tokens that have already appeared in the generated text. Positive values discourage repetition, negative values encourage it.
presencePenalty (值: None) - Adjusts the penalty for tokens based on their presence in the generated text so far. Positive values penalize tokens that have already appeared, encouraging diversity.
maxTokens (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to -1 for no limit. Be cautious when setting this to a large value, as it can lead to very long outputs.
stop (值: None) - Comma-separated list of sequences where the model will stop generating text
